name: Cyber Force
overview: Cyber Force: Zniewolony Umysł is a sci-fi action adventure game, similar to Flashback. In 2017 a scientist foresees the destruction of the world due to a nuclear war. Therefore he decides to move his consciousness into a crystal. The game starts a few hundred years after this event. The player must reach the Syntec laboratory located in SpringCity and copy the awareness of the doctor to one of the cyborgs. The game is divided into five stages, travelling each of them requires solving a number of puzzles, finding and using the appropriate items, killing enemy units and finding a way out to the next level. The character may run, crawl, jump, climb, hang off ledges, use a gun and talk with encountered people.
